members.member:
Determines whether deleted rows were requested by the client.
The request to check. True if the deleted rows are requested, otherwise False.

member.name: M:System.Net.Http.TableHttpRequestMessageExtensions.GetVersionFromIfMatch(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Gets the version of a table item from the HTTP IfMatch header. If the IfMatch contains an invalid value then an is thrown containing an with status code .
member.returns: A valid version byte array representing the version, or null if none were present.

members.member:
Determines the set of properties to include in the OData $select query option for types implementing the interface. has two sets of properties: regular properties and system properties. The system properties are only included if the __systemproperties query parameter is included in the Request URI. This function determines the combined set of selected properties and updates the request URI accordingly, if necessary.
The request to manipulate. The type of the data model. Indicates whether the original Request URI $select clause has been manipulated or not. The query is not actually validated in this step -- this happens as part of the validation. In the case of a type implementing, the set of properties selected; otherwise null.

Determines the set of properties to include in the OData $select query option for types implementing the interface. has two sets of properties: regular properties and system properties. The system properties are only included if the __systemproperties query parameter is included in the Request URI. This function determines the combined set of selected properties and updates the request URI accordingly, if necessary.
The request to manipulate. The type of the data model. Optional map specifying replacement names for system properties. Indicates whether the original Request URI $select clause has been manipulated or not. The query is not actually validated in this step -- this happens as part of the validation. In the case of a type implementing, the set of properties selected; otherwise null.

member.name: M:System.Net.Http.TableHttpRequestMessageExtensions.GetQueryOption(System.String[],System.String,System.String[],System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Int32@,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Detects whether the is present in an OData query and if so returns the index and the value of the option.
member.param: The query to check.
The option to check for.
The index into the query if the option is present; -1 otherwise.
The mapped properties for this model (CLR type).
Optional map specifying replacement names for system properties.
The to use when looking for the query parameter (default is ).
member.returns: The query option value if present; null otherwise.

member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Mobile.Service.Tables.DomainManager`1
member.summary: Provides an abstraction for accessing a backend store for a . The abstraction can be implemented in one of two ways depending on the capabilities of the backend store. Stores that support a -based model can implement the and methods whereas stores that don't support directly or where it is not the preferred way of accessing them can implement the and methods.

member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Mobile.Service.Tables.IDomainManager`1
member.summary: Provides an abstraction for accessing a backend store for a . The abstraction can be implemented in one of two ways depending on the capabilities of the backend store. Stores that support a -based model can implement the and methods whereas stores that don't support directly or where it is not the preferred way of accessing them can implement the and methods.

member.returns: An which has not yet been executed.

member.summary: Builds an to be executed against a store supporting for looking up a single item.
member.param: The id representing the item. The id is provided as part of the and is visible to the client. However, depending on the backend store and the domain model, the particular implementation may map the id to some other form of unique identifier.

member.returns: A containing the which has not yet been executed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Mobile.Service.Tables.TableQueryFilter
member.summary:
Filter for table controllers tailoring a query as follows: 1) Merges the $select query options with any system property selection options. 2) Adds support for $inlinecount by wrapping the response in a .
For returning actions marked with , this filter will "rewrite" the request URL, merging any $select with the system property selection. This ensures that the selection is performed in the DB in cases where the is backed by a DB. This minimizes the DB response size.
